meanings: Noun (그물처럼 얽혀 있는 도로신경 등의) 망
인테리어용어 네트 워크, 작업의 순서 관계를 화살표와 ○표로 표현한 망상도.

vlive.korean: 네트워크가 방해를 하네? The network is interfering. 듣기 View video CIX : 보고시퍼서😊
이거 왜... 네트워크가 잘 안 되나, 내 노트북은? Why is the network having issues? What's up with my laptop? 듣기 View video TWICE : Happy JEONGYEON Day
vlive.english: Why is the network having issues? What's up with my laptop?

vlive.korean: 명호 형! 여기 팀 네트워크 러브 형 빼고 있어! 응원해줘! Myeongho, this is the Network Love team without you. Please cheer them up! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.21 TTT #1 (Camping Ver.)
vlive.english: Myeongho, this is the Network Love team without you. Please cheer them up!

vlive.korean: 네트워크 환경이 좋지가 않은가 봐요 여기가 좀 끊기죠? I think the network environment is not so good here. I think I'm cutting off, right? 듣기 View video BTS : 쩨이홉~! 🍗🍜 2
vlive.english: I think the network environment is not so good here. I think I'm cutting off, right?

vlive.korean: [21세기의 네트워크라도 우리 윤기를 담기엔] 연결이 불안정합니다? [Even the 21st century network is not good enough for our SUGA] Network connection is unstable? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] SUGA’s 전국민 퇴사방지 프로젝트, 💸돈은! 벌어야죠!💸 (SUGA encouraging fans’ work life)
vlive.english: [Even the 21st century network is not good enough for our SUGA] Network connection is unstable?

examples.korean: Conferences are a good place to network. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 학회는 인적 네트워크를 형성하기에 좋은 곳이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Conferences are a good place to network. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a satellite hook-up between the major European networks 듣기 Add to Wordbook 주요 유럽 네트워크 간의 위성 연결 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a satellite hook-up between the major European networks Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: All our computers are plugged into the main network. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 컴퓨터는 모두 메인 네트워크에 연결되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All our computers are plugged into the main network. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We next had to navigate a complex network of committees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 다음에 우리는 위원회들의 복잡한 네트워크 문제를 처리해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We next had to navigate a complex network of committees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ISDN connectivity allows computers to communicate over a network. 듣기 Add to Wordbook ISDN 연결은 컴퓨터들이 네트워크를 통해 통신을 할 수 있게 해 준다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ISDN connectivity allows computers to communicate over a network. Add to Wordbook
